import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../tab-bar.css' import { CgHome, CgSearch, CgHeart, CgProfile, CgMenuBoxed } from 'react-icons/cg' function focus(ord) { var newArr = [false, false, false, false, false] newArr[ord] = true setMenuFocused(newArr) } function TabBar() { const [menuFocused, setMenuFocused] = useState([true, false, false, false, false]) const focusClassName = {true: "tabBar__menu focus", false: "tabBar__menu"} return (
  • Home
  • Search
  • Favorite
  • Order
  • Profile
) } export default TabBar
